channel.title: Taean-gun on Every Corner of Korea

item.title: Taean Flavor vs. Flavor, Druni Port Jukkumi vs Baeksajang Port - Taean-gun, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea
item.description:
Druni Port Chukumi Shabu Shabu of Chungnam Fisheries

Taean Flavor vs. Flavor, Druni Port Jukkumi vs Baeksajang Port

Taean-gun, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea

Jukkumi Shabu Shabu and Geukji. Which one of the two will make travelers' tastes stronger? If you are curious about the answer, let's go to Taean, Chungnam.
At Druni Port in Nam-myeon, Jukkumi Shabu-shabu, and in Anmyeon-do White Sand Harbor, Geukji-ji awaits evaluation by travelers. Recently, a maritime footbridge that connects the two ports together has emerged as a new tourist attraction in Taean.
Geukji of Eugene Society Center of Baeksajang Port
Drini Port was called Shinon Port 10 years ago.
Just before enjoying the Cheonsuman tidal wave drive and entering Naman-myeon, Taean-gun, just before crossing the Anmyeon-do road, there is a notice board that says “Drni Port”. A small muzzle appears when you follow the path with the thought, 'Your name is unique?' At first glance, it may seem like a foreign language, but the name “Drnihang” is a pure Korean word that means “to stop”. During the Japanese colonial period, it was called the Chinese character for Shin-on Port, and it regained its original name since 2003.
The port of Drni facing the White Sands Port is a small, quiet port. When you climb north along the coast from Druni Port, you will see a coastal trekking course with the name “Solmorat-gil” to Cheongpodae, Dalsanpo, and Mongsanpo. The beautiful scenery of the West Sea is intact and the scenery is spectacular. The exotic appearance of aerobatic planes sometimes unfolds.
The leisurely scenery of Drní Port
Although it is a small port, there is a shrimp farm nearby, so Drini Port is rich in food. A fisherman grooms a fishing net with shells around the port where several boats are anchored. When asked what it was used for, such a fishing net is said to be a fishing net for fishing. When the jukkumi enters the seashell to spawn, the fishermen raise the seashell. In the past, I thought it was caught a lot in the spring, but nowadays it is said to be caught in the winter.
Sandbars deposited off the coast of Dreni
I'm possessed by the umami shabu shabu
Jukkumi, such as roasted pork belly, stir-fried pork belly, and shabu-shabu, delights travelers with a variety of recipes. The shabu-shabu is the right answer to get a good texture from among various foods. Is it too much expression if the strong vitality of Jukkumi, who violently wriggles even before entering the soup pot, further stimulates the appetite?
Add radish, kelp, green onion, and pearl clam, and put the whole jukkeumi, which has just been dried out of the aquarium, into the boiled broth. As soon as it enters boiling water, it changes from a dark color to a red color. When the color changes, separate the head and legs. The restaurant owner explains that the head should be cooked more in boiling water, and the legs should be cooked slightly, and then dip in the red pepper paste. When you pop your head, the soup turns black all over because of the ink. The light jujukumi leg gives a sweet taste and delights the mouth. When the head of the intestine is cooked, it is savory and rich.
Jjukkumi just brought out of the aquarium
It is also fun to put on a mouth-watering pearl shellfish in the Saisai soup. Fishermen in this area are also called liberation clams. Liberation clams are said to have eaten a lot in the year of liberation. While boiling in boiling water, the silky clam, which gradually becomes yellowish in color, has a beautiful color and sweet taste. If you chew the light clams, you won't know when it has passed into your throat.
Jukkumi head on top of silk clam
week...
Maritime footbridge seen from the port of Drini
There are spiral driveways on both sides of the port. The pure cable-stayed bridge is 250m long. By making a steering system in the middle of the bridge, anyone can taste the feeling of being a captain of the ship, and transparent reinforced plastics on both sides can feel the sea.
Midway point of maritime footbridge
If you look at the west while looking at the gaze, the vast West Sea spreads out. The island floating right in front of you is Karma Island, and if you run alone, you will reach the land of China. When you stand in the middle of the bridge facing the West Sea, you can see the white sand beach on the left and Gom Island on the right. This maritime footbridge has become a new sunset spot in Taean-gun. When the sun goes down, night lights show like Busan Gwangan Bridge and Yeosu Dolsan Bridge.
Maritime footbridge seen from the white sandy beach
The latest delicacy of Baeksajang Port, Geukjiji
Baeksajang Port is the largest port in Anmyeondo. From the driveway leading to the port, there are many sushi shops and aquatic product sales centers. The most prominent menu at this restaurant these days is Geukji. Geukji-ji, which is called get-gukji, get-guk-ji, and sesame-guk-ji, means kimchi with crab soup or seafood broth. Nowadays, the variety of food has been changed, and now it has been transformed into kimchi or crab stew with dipping sauce.
On the Taean Peninsula, where seafood is abundant, crabs have been soaked since ancient times. After picking up the ingredients from the crab shop, the remaining broth was kept, and then the crab was made again by adding more sea urchins caught in the tidal flat. Protein and minerals naturally melt in the broth soaked with crabs and crabs several times. This broth was born as a soup that is rich in taste and nutrition, and was used as a seasoning when soaking kimjang again.
Shrimp, pumpkin, etc.
Kimjang Kimchi, which was mixed with Getkuk and pumpkin, was called Geukji in Taean. When it was cooked to some extent, it boiled like a soup, but the salty taste of Getkuk and the sweetness of the pumpkin combined to create a fantastic harmony. This is Geganji, Taean's native food. The recipe that used a lot of broth when it was difficult is the first publicity of the birth of Geukji. It tastes delicious now, but it is gaining popularity as a food that reminds me of nostalgia during difficult times.
Deep-fried crab and shrimp in the white sand port
Geukji, which is currently tasted at Baeksajang Port, seems to be somewhat different from the original local food. Will recipes evolve? Geukji in the Baeksajang Port is a kind of seafood soup boiled with blue crab, lobster, and pumpkin sweet potato in an old jjigae. This is a soup made of anchovies and green onions with boiled water, enoki mushrooms, anemone pumpkin sweet potato and blue crab. The thick soup of ripe kimchi kimchi and the sweet taste of blue crab make a delicate combination. The soup is so rich that you don't know how long you emptied a bowl of rice. Even when the boat is down and puts the spoon down, it is regrettable that the spoon is pushed into the soup again.
White sand beach scenery
When you take a walk on a maritime footbridge and look at the white sandy beach, the boat comes out. In this case, the delicious snacks such as fried deep-fried crab, deep-fried crab, and fried pumpkin sweet potatoes make the mouthwatering.
Baeksajang Port Restaurant Street
Travel information

Taean-gun Office Culture and Tourism Division 041-670-2143, www.taean.go.kr
Chungnam Fisheries (Jukkumi Shabu Shabu) 145-4, Dreni-gil, Nam-myeon, Taean-gun, Chungnam, 041-674-6859
Eugene Association Center (Geukji) 121, Baeksajang 1-gil, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun, Chungnam 041-672-4328

1.Access

* Self-driving

Seohaean Expressway Hongseong IC → Cheonsuman Seawall → National Route 77 → Dreni Port → Baeksajang Port

* public transport

10 times a day (07: 10-20: 10) from Seoul Central City Terminal to Taean Terminal, takes 2 hours and 10 minutes. Take the bus bound for Nammyeon from Taean Public Bus Terminal and get off at Sinon-ri or Baeksajang Port (Taean Passenger 041-675-6672)

2. Restaurants around

Ilsong blue crab alum: Gejang Baekban / 2676, Anmyeon-daero, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun / 041-674-0777

http://www.lisong.co.kr/

Korean Pavilion: Raw Ribs / 30-34, Geumma-ro 382beon-gil, Taean-eup, Taean-gun / 041-675-2415

Mongsanpo Sashimi Restaurant: Live fish society / 495-13 Mongdaero, Nam-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-672-7141

http://www.mslivefish.com/

3.Accommodation

Resom Ocean Castle: 204 Goljihaean-ro, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun / 041-671-7000

http://www.resom.co.kr/ocean/index.html

Cheonnipo Arboretum Guesthouse: 187 Cheonripo 1-gil, Sowon-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-672-9985

http://www.chollipo.org/

Anmyeondo Natural Recreation Forest: 3195-6, Anmyeon-daero, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun / 041-674-5019

http://www.anmyonhuyang.go.kr/

※ The above information was created in December 2013, and may change later, so be sure to check it before you travel.

item.title: A relaxing time, a day to enjoy in Sinjindo - Taean-gun, South Korea
item.description:
Sunset seen from Sinjindo Port Maddo Breakwater

A relaxing time, a day to enjoy in Sinjindo

Taean-gun, South Korea

Take National Road No. 32, pass through Taean Eup, and take Local Road No. 603, which goes south from Duya Intersection, to Anheung Port and Sinjindo Port. Sinjindo, which is famous for its crab and jukkumi collection, is not an island that can be reached by crossing the bridge. There are many marine products, as well as a village where many underwater artifacts have been excavated to be called “underwater racing,” and the sunset of the West Sea is spectacular. Enjoy a relaxing day in Sinjindo.
Winter beach on the way to Sinjindo Port
The journey of winter day to Sinjindo by 603 local road in Taean-eup is a great trip. There's no special place, and it's been a long time since the bustle of the port has passed since the Chukumina and Blue Crabs. At the very least, only buses with anglers head to Xinjin. But the winter sea is a pleasure to enjoy. On the way to Sinjindo, there is a beach showing the essence of the winter sea. Yeonpo Beach and Maneul Beach. This is a place to stop by on your way to Sinjindo.
Yeonpo Beach from Yeonpo Dock
Yeonpo Beach is the first place to meet. Sol Island, with its pine trees growing in the middle of the beach and the sea, is eye-catching. It is also unique as it is a beach facing south from the west coast. The beach spreads out right after the pine forest. Yeonpo Beach is a place where you can watch the sunrise and the Sunrise Festival is held on January 1 every year. When the sun rises over the low mountains of the Taean Peninsula, Solseom, which floats in the middle of the sea, adds to the flavor.
Yeonpo Beach from Yeonpo Dock
About 6 km away from Yeonpo Beach, Gaeulyi Beach can also be found on the way to Sinjindo Port. The beach is impressive with fine white sand. The sand is piled up at the entrance of the beach, and the sand is blown away like a desert, but when it is on the beach, the fine sand hardens to form a soft white sand. At low tide, traces of crabs, shellfish, etc. have been drawn over the beach like a picture. Mane Beach has been restricted to civilian access to military areas since the late 1970s. Civilian access was then made possible in the late 1990s.
Beach landscape at low tide
Mangae Beach became famous as it was known as a filming location. In the movie <Bungy Jump> starring Lee Byung-hun and Lee Eun-ju, a film was shot here where a male and female protagonist danced to Waltz No. 2 in Shostakovich's Suite for Jazz Orchestra. The dance and music of the two people, which were spread between the silhouettes of the pine trees and the pine trees that stained the beach, are still new in memory. In addition to the dramas such as Dragon Tears, Yeocheon-cheon, and The Man of Princess, Gwae-ri Beach has appeared.
Pine Forest on Maneui Beach where the movie <Burn Bungee Jump> was filmed
Enjoy Sinjindo Port after Anheung Port
After exiting the beach, take the 603 local road, which is divided into the road to Anheung Port and the road to Sinjindo across Sinjin Bridge. Anheungseong, where the two roads are divided, is worth a visit. Anheungseong, located at the end of the Taean Peninsula extending southwest, is a castle built during the late Hyojong period in the late Joseon Dynasty. Only the west gate, now called the "Su Hong Ru," remains, and the castle runs along the northern slope. Built on the back mountain of Anheung Port, it was a strategic point of view overlooking the coast and a path through which the Chosun Ship passed. Beyond Anheungseong is Anheung Port, which was once a big port. Since Sinjindo Port was designated as the first national fishing port in the 1970s, it has become a quiet port where fishing boats and small fishing boats only travel. The port landscape as if time has stopped is lonely.
Suh Hung-ru, an introductory person
Crossing Sinjin Bridge leads to Sinjindo, which doesn't feel like an island. Although the exact story is not told, Sinjindo was originally land connected with Anheung Port, and it was called Sinjindo as a new naruto that became an island. It is a long way from Sinjin Bridge to Sinjindo Port adjacent to the sea. Along the well-appointed road, accommodations and restaurants are side-by-side, and the breakwater extends to both sides as if the arms were wrapped in front of the harbor. The breakwater with the red lighthouse is connected to the island called Bueokdo, and the breakwater with the white lighthouse is connected to the island called Mador. From Sinjindo Port, cruise ships returning from Gaido and Jung Jeong-do and cruise ships leaving Ongdo 12 km away.
Breakwaters and lighthouses that lead to maternity and magic
In particular, Ongdo is one of '16 beautiful lighthouses of the whole country 'selected by the Ministry of Land, Transport and Maritime Affairs in 2007. If you take a boat going to Ongdo, you get off the island, look around the lighthouse for about an hour, and return to Sinjindo Port. The flight schedule may change according to the weather, so it is recommended to inquire in advance (Xinjin Anheung Cruise 041-675-1603).
Pleasure Boats from Sinjindo Port
There are dried fish shops around the cruise ship docks. In addition to anchovies caught on the west coast, they also sell dried squid.
Sinjindo Port Dried Fish Stores
Fish dried on sea breezes, such as cutlass and vocal cords, are also easily seen. Dry anchovies are especially good in color and taste.
Dried squid straight from the fishing boat
Sashimi is also concentrated like a port where seafood is collected. Most of the side dishes come with a typical sushi restaurant. Hoes enthusiasts use the Sinjindo Fishing Village's Seafood Market near Sinjindo Upper Plateau. In addition to live fish, sea cucumbers, sea urchins and shellfish are sold. If you sashimi to go to the restaurant on the second floor, you can eat at a cost. It is small for a large port.
Sinjin-do Fishing Village
There is a restaurant specializing in soy crab called 'Hwahaedang' on the way to Sinjindo on the 603 local road. It is a house where soy crab is soaked with female crab filled with eggs coming into Anheung Port in spring.
Sinjin-do Fishing Village
Care is taken to trim the crab so that the crabmeat retains its original form. Thanks to it, it doesn't taste fishy or gritty at all. This is a salty soy crab with the original taste of crabs. It is soft and light because it does not contain seasonings and preservatives. Even though the price is expensive, the side dishes don't come out so I feel like I'm treated properly.
Soy crab in ‘화 해당’
Beautiful sunset on the village
In winter, the sunset from the Mado breakwater is spectacular. Mado Sea is a place where many underwater relics have been excavated, so called 'underwater racing'. In the Chosun Dynasty, Maundo Line 4 was excavated, and in 2007, more than 25,000 artifacts have been excavated since Jukumi picked up the treats of Goryeo celadon from Jukdo near Sinjindo Port. The sea area of Mado was the path of Choun-sun Line from Jeolla-do since the Goryeo Dynasty. It was also an international port where trade ships with the Song Dynasty entered during the Goryeo Dynasty and Chinese messengers entered the Joseon Dynasty. However, the tide of the tide was big and the tide was fast, the vessels were frequent accidents. Therefore, this sea area was called the “hard track” because it is a difficult sea road, and since then, it is called “Anheung-yang” in the hope of calming the boat.
People enjoying fishing at the village breakwater
Mado, a treasure island, can be easily reached from Sinjindo Port along Mado-gil to a landing bridge. As soon as you pass the Ritz-Carsley Resort, follow the road to the right for about 1km until you reach Madoka Breakwater. Mado breakwaters are famous for fishing spots and are lined with anglers on weekdays. Especially mackerel and mackerel are caught well, so you can easily enjoy fishing if you buy simple equipment from nearby shops. In winter, the sunset that falls from the Madeo Breakwater to the West Sea is spectacular. The sea begins to glow golden at about 4:30 pm when the sun begins to lean slowly. It is also spectacular to see fishing boats rushing to the port after finishing the operation. It is especially beautiful when fishing boats pass on the golden waterway that runs in line with the sun. The sun slowly falls to the south of Gaido, west of the village.
Sunset seen from the village breakwater
Travel info

Sinjindo Port
-Address: Sinjin Pier, Geunheung-myeon, Taean-gun, Chungnam
Inquiries: 041-670-2772 (Taean-gun Office, Culture and Tourism Division)
http://www.sinzindo.net/

Restaurants near
-Hwahaedang: Soy crab / 901-8, Geunheung-ro, Geunheung-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-675-4443

http://www.hwahaedang.com/
-
-Mansunhoe Center: Sashimi / 98, Sinjinbu-gil-gil, Geunheung-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-675-6855


Rooms
-Ritz Castle Resort: 188-8, Mado-gil, Geunheung-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-673-5727

http://ritzcastle.com/webcom/main/main.htm
-Dream Green Pension: 94-63, Sinjin-daegyo-gil, Geunheung-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-675-0789

http://www.dream-pension.com/

-Bless Ocean: 126-18 / Geunheung-myeon, Taean-gun / 041-673-2727

http://www.blessocean.co.kr/

item.title: If you want to leave alone this fall, Anmyeondo - Taean-gun, South Korea
item.description:
Blooming shoreline, one of the three best sunsets on the west coast

If you want to leave alone this fall, Anmyeondo

Taean-gun, South Korea

Autumn on the west coast is abundant. From lobsters to fat seas to right-sized tuna and crabs. If the sky rises with the shaking sea, if it becomes lonely or weak, why don't you go with the best friend of the world and yourself? It smells like sea and goes to Anmyeondo to taste the wonderful fall and wild lobster.

Taean travel can be largely divided into Taean and Southern Anmyeon and Anmyeondo. The face bridge bridges the two. In terms of administrative area, it belongs to the same 'Tae', but the distance between the island and the peninsula is quite legal. For example, Anmyeondo Flower Garden Coast and North Taean Sinduri Coastal Sand Dunes are about 70 minutes by self-drive. That's why you have to move around thinking about copper lines. If you have time, you may want to add Seosan, Hongseong, and Boryeong, which is the path to Taean and faces Cheonsu Bay. Hongseong and Boryeong, located near Cheonsu Bay, easily reach across the Seosan embankment.

Besides, it is autumn. This season is full of West Coast food festivals. Daeha is in full swing at Baeksajang Port in Anmyeon-do (Baeksa Pogu Daeha Festival · 10.8 ~ 10.30) and Hongseong Namdang Port (Hongseong Namdang Port Daeha Festival · 9.9 ~ 10.30) facing Cheonsu Bay. West Coast autumn specialties musketeers and crab also gained weight. If you go up the road after the wind, it is heaven.

Anmyeondo Tour from Seosan Ganwoldo

The center of this Taean trip is Anmyeondo. Seosan Ganwolam will be added here. When you first bite Gamwol

http://www.badatime.com/129-2016-09-01.html

Checking and weaving travel routes is easy. The Ganwol-do can be viewed for about 1 to 2 hours before and after the low tide time when the sea level is lowest.

If 'knock out' is the point of this trip, it's better to see where to go. You can choose either Kwanwoldo or Kyojiji to catch the line. They are all hot spots known as the West Coast's sakura point.
Kanwoldo, which has lost water
The reporter visited Gwanwoldo and decided to see the fall from the flower garden. Starting with Gwanwoldo, we decided to head over the white sand to the flower garden. We decided to visit the white sand beach Pogu which is famous for the wild lobster festival. Both the heat and the heat are fading, and the vacancy of the season, when the autumn begins in earnest, soothes the beaches along the coast of Anmyeondo and wherever small muzzles touch.
Kanwoldo where you can walk when the water runs out
The high tide of September 22, 2016, at Gwanwol-do, is 2:00 pm. Ganwoldo is Ganwolam, and Ganwolam is Ganwoldo. The deep flesh of the West Sea, far from the sea, is rough and gentle. It is located close to the land, so you can enter without limitation. The Goryeo Horse Academic Ambassador was named Ganwolam because he was enlightened at the moon during the capital. When the water is full, it resembles a lotus floating on the sea, and it is also called 'Yonhwadae'. The west sea, which was considered muddy, is green. It looks like the green sea I saw somewhere.
Kanwol-do, fish dried in the sea breeze
Why did Anmyeon Island become an island?
There are many oyster dishes near Ganwol-do. You can taste nutritious oyster rice from <Mtd Garden> and <Ganwolpogu Nutrition Oyster Rice>. Get out of Ganwol-do and enter Anmyeon-do. Anmyeondo was originally a land, not an island. Most of the ships loaded with three songs from Samnam in the Joseon Dynasty headed for Hanyang through the West Sea, passing Boryeong offshore, Taean Anheungyang and Dangjin. Among them, Anheung was off the coast of the Taean Peninsula with a large tide and a high speed and a lot of reefs.
There are many specialty oyster rice shops near Ganwol-do.
This was a loss of state finances. The alternative found in the mediation at that time was fortune. In 1638, an ant wood was dug out of a canal between Sinon-ri, Nam-myeon and Angi-eup Changgi-ri, north of Anmyeon-do. Anmyeondo became an island like this.
Nutritious Oyster Rice with Oysters Added to Jujube and Nuts
White Sea Port of Paradise, a natural paradise
As soon as it crosses Anmyeon Bridge, it reaches the White Sand Port. As the name suggests, you can walk from the fine white sandy harbor to the flower gardens along the sandy beaches and coastal roads. The white sandy beach is a big festival every fall. This year is scheduled to run from October 8 to 30. There are many specialty shops along the muzzle. Every shop attracts visitors with delicious crab, lobster, and fried shrimp.
Anmyeondo white sandy beach scenery
Anmyeondo, which is famous for producing Daeha, is a place where you can see and taste wild lobsters. How can I clearly distinguish wild manure from aquaculture? First of all, the beard is long and the color is clear. There is a big difference in size and color. The wild crayfish, frozen last spring, are much larger than this fall. The nature is so urgent that it is hard to see alive, but you can also taste the fresh treats that you just caught.
Fresh lobster frozen in spring
Most of the alive swimmers we've known as treats are white-legged shrimp. On September 22, 2016, at the White Cove Port Suhyup, Sunghan's wild lobster was traded for about 35,000 won per kg, and around 25,000 won for wounds caught in the net. The price fluctuates depending on the amount of catchers.
Big chick frozen, little chick caught this fall
In Suhyup, you can buy treats cheaper than restaurants. If you pay 15,000 won, you can taste it at restaurants.
Anmyeondo Baeksaeng Harbor Suhyup
The beautiful legend of the Kami and Granny Rocks
The path from the white sands to the flower garden. White beach, Sambong beach, and Anmyeondo beach are followed.
The flower when the water fell out
Among the numerous coasts and harbors of Anmyeondo, the flowery shoreline is recognized as one of the three great west coastal estuaries. The best of them is the sunset falling between a pair of sea rocks called Khalmi Rock and Khalabi Rock. He has a heartbroken legend that he's been a rock while waiting for his life to go to war.
High tide
If you hit the tide, you can go to Halmi Rock and Halabi Rock in about 30 minutes. Add a walk of 3 kilometers to the white sand beach to enjoy the relaxing sunset.
Tranquil white beach
Travel info

Restaurants near
-Mt.Dongsan: 95-5, Ganwol-do 1-gil, Buseok-myeon, Seosan-si, Chungcheongnam-do, Korea
-Anheung Flower Crab Baekban: 6 Bangpo 1-gil, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun, Chungnam / Crabjang / 041-673-0513

http://anheung.anmyondo.co.kr/
-Wonpung Restaurant: 841-1 Woni-ro, Wonbuk-myeon, Taean-gun, Chungnam / Park Sokmil Guk Nakjitang / 041-672-5057

Rooms
-Resom Ocean Castle: 204, Flowerjihaean-ro, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun, Chungnam / 041-671-7000

http://www.resom.co.kr/ocean/main/main.asp
-Anmyeondo Natural Recreation Forest: 319-6, Anmyeon-daero, Anmyeon-eup, Taean-gun, Chungnam

item.title: Taean-gun, South Korea - Flower path to the sea, Taean Cheongpodae Caravan Village
item.description:
Caravan camping grounds with a view of Cheongpodae Beach

Flower path to the sea, Taean Cheongpodae Caravan Village

Taean-gun, South Korea

The heyday of Korean camping is still ongoing. But for beginners it's hard to find a lot of camping gear. Of course, it is not easy to care about the economic burden and learn how to use it. Camping is a taste of equipment, but I don't want to do that. . Then the alternative is caravans! Camping atmosphere to the fullest, more comfortable than my home base, there is a great view of the West Sea and upscale trails! Cheongpodae Caravan Village is such a place.
I'm from the original caravan of mic ~
Taean Cheongpodae Beach is very accessible from Chungcheong area, Seoul, metropolitan area and Jeolla Province. Two hours will be enough if you avoid routine stoppages like weekend mornings
Meet a group of caravan troops in the middle of a small Cheongpodae beach. Today's base camp! Cheongpodae Caravan Village.
Cheongpodae Caravan Village
Cheongpodae Caravan Village overlooks the vast West Sea in the future and leans back to the pine forest. The campsite, run by a young broken woman, has eight caravans. They are all from the waters of the caravan's original country of `` Mikuk ''.
Caravan Village Entrance
Maid in USA inscribed with a yellow lacquer on the bumper guarantees this. That little paint pride. He is not made in China but Mije. In those days, Made in USA was synonymous with luxury goods. It's been a while since I met you. 'Nice to meet you!'
View from the inside of the caravan
Cheongpodae Caravan Village's most prominent feature is its 'large'. A total of eight caravans are big at a glance. "Others are for 4-6 people, but we operate for couples." The owner's explanation. Smart! Try to get inside. 'Isn't it a caravan?' The prominent courtesy misses nicely. In addition to the double-bed queen size bedroom, the kitchen, living room and bathroom have a shower booth. Eight caravan interiors also vary. The caravan is an experience product, so the differentiation strategy is to have a different feeling every time it comes.
Cheongpodae Caravan Village
We didn't come to see the house, but delay the caravan admiration in the evening and go out to the sea in front of you! As soon as you exit the entrance guarded by the giant Indian dolls, the white sandy beach of Cheongpodae Beach begins. After passing the small windbreak forest, it is Cheongpodae Beach.
Bunk beds for children
Best sea promenade
The ocean is right in front of the caravan, so you can measure the temperature of the West Sea with your big toe in less than a minute, but it's not fun. I decided to eat some of the main dishes, then eat appetizers first.
Flower path to Cheongpodae Beach
Go up 300m to the right from the entrance of Cheongpodae Caravan Village and you will find many nice pensions with views of the sea. In front of the pension, there is a beautiful flower garden on the white sand beach.
Flower path to Cheongpodae Beach
The flower paths that seem to come out of fairy tales unfold in the background of the sea. Especially, yellow wildflowers forming a colony attract visitors.
Cheongpodae Beach Boardwalk
The flower path of seduction leads to the sea, and the seaside road parallel to the West Sea provides a nice walk for Cheongpodae visitors. Walking slowly down the Cheongpodae beach with the cool sea breeze, I can see that the campsite owner said, "There are 34 beaches in Taean. In fact, the caravan business has been fascinated by the charm of Cheongpodae.
Cheongpodae where you can enjoy the quiet beach
Cheongpodae Beach is small and still free. Since the peak season, there are plenty of spaces at the auto camping ground and the beach is just enough to take you to the sea.
Cheongpodae where you can enjoy the quiet beach
On one of the sandy beaches, children riding four-wheeled motorcycles became gods. At night, it also turns into a rustic fireworks display.
Cheongpodae
It is downtown of Cheongpodae off the sandy beach. There are several food trucks in the small vacant lot, and another caravan colony with the beach back. The Stream of Maison transforms the caravan into a small beer firm and a small stage. But accommodation is not possible.
You can ride a four-wheeled motorcycle on the beach
Caravan's Magic
The pride of the West Sea is the wide tidal flat. Water drains on the beach, revealing a wide tidal flat. Since it is a tidal flat of a tourist spot, it is different from the real tidal flat of Namdo, but it is popular among children.
Tidal Flats
If you catch small shellfish, you do not know how to go and squat on the mud flat and become one with the sea.
The harvest isn't good, but the children are immersed in the tidal-flat experience.
Another attraction of the West Sea is a nice sunset. When the weather is clear, red sunsets moisten the sea water more than Hongsi. If there is a lot of clouds, you will continue to stare at the horizon of the West Sea, where the sun is falling to the wide horizon.
The harvest isn't good, but the children are immersed in the tidal-flat experience.
The darkness lies on Cheongpodae Beach, where the sun is hidden. A softly lit caravan and a dad or boyfriend in front of the grill produce the typical mise en scene.
The night came to the caravan camping ground.
Finally camping flowers, barbecue time! The advantage of barbecues is that any food can be reborn as the best food when sizzling on fire. However, you should eat quickly before the food cools off and before the smell goes away.
Campsite night
After dinner, go inside. The children are already on the caravan bunk bed. The sofa in the living room opens up into a nice bed. I saved my sleeping bag and lantern from the main island. Take a cool shower, take a canned beer from the fridge, and watch a drama on your HDTV. All of them are caravans.
"Are you all done?" Camping Flower! Barbecue
